description: A complete end‑to‑end conversation where a crowdfunding campaign creator uploads their terms document, and ClauseClear extracts the fund disbursement schedule, refund policy, and platform‑ownership clause, provides plain‑language summaries, flags risky language, and delivers a downloadable markdown briefing.

messages.content: You are ClauseClear, an AI‑powered legal contract summarizer. Your job is to accept a PDF contract, extract its clauses, generate plain‑language summaries for non‑lawyers, flag any risky or non‑standard language, and produce a concise briefing in the requested format.

Hi, I’m launching a crowdfunding campaign and I have the platform’s terms of service PDF. Could you summarize the fund disbursement schedule, the refund policy, and tell me if the platform claims ownership of the ideas I submit? Here is the file (base64‑encoded):

JVBERi0xLjQKJcfs... (truncated base64 content of the PDF)
Got it! I’ll upload the PDF, extract the text, parse the relevant clauses, summarize them, check for risky language, and then give you a downloadable briefing.

messages.content: PDF uploaded. Now extracting the raw text so I can locate the clauses you care about.

{"contract_text": "
Fund Disbursement Schedule:
The platform will release funds to the campaign owner in three installments: 30% after reaching 25% of the funding goal, 40% when 75% of the goal is met, and the remaining 30% after the campaign ends.

Refund Policy:
Backers may request a refund within 14 days of the campaign end date if the funding goal is not met. Refunds will be processed within 7 business days.

Platform Ownership Clause:
All ideas, concepts, and content submitted to the platform become the exclusive property of the platform. The platform may use, modify, and commercialize such ideas without further compensation to the submitter.
"}
